basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC = 25 μM), Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538p (MIC = 25 μM), Staphylococcus epidermis ATCC 12228 (MIC = 100 μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC = 25 μM), Shigella dysentariae ATCC 9752 (MIC = 100 μM), Salmonella typhimurium ATCC 14028 (MIC > 100 μM), Klebsiella pneumonia ATCC 10031 (MIC = 50 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC = 100 μM).
